message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I understand your position.  While I value our potential deal, I can't go lower than $9,200. This reflects the product's true value and leaves room for both of us to benefit.  Let's find a way to make this work!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to pay up to $9,100 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
